channel.title: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA
channel.description:
Here's the link:
[url=http://www.develop-online.net/news/39527/Jagex-and-Tiga-hit-out-at-SOPA]Jagex and Tiga hit out at SOPA | Game Development | News by Develop[/url]
This the response Jagex and Tiga gave to SOPA.

item.title: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:17, topic:429750”]Because being poor is an excuse for piracy.

My suggestion is to grow up.[/quote]
o-o… I hope you know, growing up won’t stop the fact someone’s poor o-o.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA

item.title: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:19, topic:429750”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=532430.msg3892185#msg3892185 date=1326959070]
Because being poor is an excuse for piracy.

My suggestion is to grow up.
[/quote]
Who said it was an excuse to pirate? Its just the reason that I do pirate, if I could offored to buy things like I could even 3 months ago (still had my job then) then I would gladly buy from Steam, EA, etc. I’ll probably do like last time and buy these later when I actually do have a job again.[/quote]
+1

People wouldn’t pirate if they could afford not to. So Spel, we all know that the wealth gap between the rich and poor is clearly unacceptable and your giving me the impression you think that everyone should pay for the same things? See, if you put wealth into the equation I would gladly pay for everything. Its like atm anyways the balance between piracy atm is more favoured towards the less well of but by doing this the balance is being completed tipped to the wealthy which instantly makes new social inequalities and other factors. There are other points but yeah thats the easiest one to explain as its a pretty complicated area.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA

@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:17, topic:429750”]Because being poor is an excuse for piracy.

My suggestion is to grow up.[/quote]
Who said it was an excuse to pirate? Its just the reason that I do pirate, if I could offored to buy things like I could even 3 months ago (still had my job then) then I would gladly buy from Steam, EA, etc. I’ll probably do like last time and buy these later when I actually do have a job again.

item.title: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:14, topic:429750”][quote author=RS2BullDog link=topic=532430.msg3891734#msg3891734 date=1326928175]

OMFG THANK YOU SO MUCH JAGEX FOR BEING AGAINST IT. I do aggree with the Online Piracy thing… Unless it has something to do with RSPS’s…

fu pirate 4life
where am I going to get my programs games and movies

A Shop?? or from their website???
[/quote]

Not all of us have alot of money in this shit economy US has dug into.[/quote]

Exactly, I’m about to loose my truck and phones. Last thing I will have left is a motorcycle and no money to go find a job.

item.title: Jagex and Tiga response to SOPA
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

RS2BullDog:

so what that website is saying that even RS is against SOPA then?

It’s saying Jagex is against SOPA, but not against the stopping of online piracy. They are only against it because it may lead to significant problems for their American users.

Read full topic
